author: hwright
msg: Use the svn_checksum_t type in the dag-tree interface.
text_baton_t): Use svn_checksum_t instead of a hex digest.
(base_apply_textdelta, base_apply_text): Parse the input hex digest into a
svn_checksum_t agruments, and stop converting from hex internally.
